alert.note: Alert for Freestone; Navarro (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 12:26AM CDT until May 07 at 1:30AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Freestone County in central Texas... Navarro County in north central Texas... * Until 130 AM CDT. * At 1226 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Angus, or 7 miles southwest of Corsicana, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Corsicana, Kerens, Wortham, Trinidad, Dawson, Angus, Barry, Navarro, Fairfield Lake, Lake Halbert, Richland-Chambers Reservoir, Fairfield Lake State Park, Trinidad Lake, Navarro Mills Lake, Rice, Retreat, Oak Valley, Mildred, Eureka and Richland. This includes Interstate 45 between mile markers 203 and 238. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
